summary: Rollback production deployment from Version 25 to Version 24 to restore correct user roles (admin/hotel/guest) and associated panels/areas.
architectural_notes: Production must support rollback to last stable release (Version 24) when critical role/permission regressions occur.
known_issues: Version 25 regression: all accounts (admin/hotel) appear as guest; admin panel and Hotel Area are missing.

existing_features.title: Restore the application behavior to match Version 24 by fixing the Version 25 regression where Admin and Hotel accounts are treated as Guest accounts, causing the Admin Panel (/admin) and Hotel Area (/hotel) to disappear or become inaccessible.
Update the frontend build/version identifier so production clearly reflects the rollback to Version 24 (for verification and support), and ensure user-facing text remains in English.
Run and pass the existing regression checks specifically for Authentication & Authorization, Admin Panel access, and Hotel Area access after the Version 24 rollback behavior is restored.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure backend authorization and role detection APIs used by the frontend (e.g., user role and admin checks) return correct results consistent with Version 24, and do not reset or corrupt existing role/authorization state during upgrade/deploy.

projectName: Rollback Version 25 regression by restoring Version 24 role-based access (Admin/Hotel/Guest) and panels
